title: Cascade Components links for Sentinel and Heckler eMTB increase travel, progression
content:
Cascade Components, developers of aftermarket links for full suspension mountain bikes, have today released new links for the Transition Sentinel V2 and the Santa Cruz Heckler eMTB. Not only do they ramp up progression, they also bump up the rear wheel travel significantly. Let’s dig into the numbers. Cascade Components Santa Cruz Heckler Link As […]

The post Cascade Components links for Sentinel and Heckler eMTB increase travel, progression appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
